title: Nvidia, Victoria’s Secret, Rivian, Macy’s: What to Watch in the Stock Market Today
sub_head: Victoria’s Secret shares gained after its earnings report; A pair of electric-vehicle startups were ticking lower premarket
body:
Futures are rising amid another wave of earnings reports and as jobless claims held steady. Here’s what we’re watching in Thursday’s trading:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
